meanings.sent1: She was decolorizing her old t-shirt to make it white again.

meanings.definition: The process of making something colorless.
meanings.sent1: The decolorizing of the fabric was necessary to achieve the desired look.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use decolorizing agents in the lab to remove unwanted hues from solutions.
meanings.sent3: The decolorizing of the sky at sunset made it look like a giant canvas waiting to be painted.
meanings.sent4: The decolorizing of the water in the pool gave it a crystal-clear appearance.
meanings.sent5: The decolorizing of the photograph gave it a vintage, black-and-white charm.
